channel.title: Really need help bad please

item.title: Really need help bad please
item.dc:creator: @dimebagx dimebagx
item.description:
@dimebagx wrote:

Ok, this is what I’ve found for the special attack bar:

[code]public int specBar = 10;
public int specialRestoreTimer;
public boolean specOn = false;
public void SpecialsProcess()
{
esbar(12323);
getRefill();
getFilling();
}
public void esbar(int id)
{
outStream.createFrame(171);
outStream.writeByte(0);
outStream.writeWord(id);
flushOutStream();
}
public void resetBar()
{
specOn = false;
sendQuest(“S P E C I A L A T T A C K”, 12335);
}

public void getRefill()
{
	if (specialRestoreTimer == 0 && specBar < 10)
	{
		specialRestoreTimer = 120;
		specBar++;
	}
	if(specialRestoreTimer > 0)
		specialRestoreTimer--;
}
public void fsBar(int id1, int id2, int id3)
{
outStream.createFrame(70);
outStream.writeWord(id1);
outStream.writeWordBigEndian(id2);
outStream.writeWordBigEndian(id3);
}

public void getFilling() {
	if (specBar == 10)
	{
		fsBar(500, 0, 12325);
		fsBar(500, 0, 12326);
		fsBar(500, 0, 12327);
		fsBar(500, 0, 12328);
		fsBar(500, 0, 12329);
		fsBar(500, 0, 12330);
		fsBar(500, 0, 12331);
		fsBar(500, 0, 12332);
		fsBar(500, 0, 12333);
		fsBar(500, 0, 12334);
	}
	else if (specBar == 9)
	{
		fsBar(500, 0, 12325);
		fsBar(500, 0, 12326);
		fsBar(500, 0, 12327);
		fsBar(500, 0, 12328);
		fsBar(500, 0, 12329);
		fsBar(500, 0, 12330);
		fsBar(500, 0, 12331);
		fsBar(500, 0, 12332);
		fsBar(500, 0, 12333);
		fsBar(0, 0, 12334);
	}
	else if (specBar == 8)
	{
		fsBar(500, 0, 12325);
		fsBar(500, 0, 12326);
		fsBar(500, 0, 12327);
		fsBar(500, 0, 12328);
		fsBar(500, 0, 12329);
		fsBar(500, 0, 12330);
		fsBar(500, 0, 12331);
		fsBar(500, 0, 12332);
		fsBar(0, 0, 12333);
		fsBar(0, 0, 12334);
	}
	else if (specBar == 7)
	{
		fsBar(500, 0, 12325);
		fsBar(500, 0, 12326);
		fsBar(500, 0, 12327);
		fsBar(500, 0, 12328);
		fsBar(500, 0, 12329);
		fsBar(500, 0, 12330);
		fsBar(500, 0, 12331);
		fsBar(0, 0, 12332);
		fsBar(0, 0, 12333);
		fsBar(0, 0, 12334);
	}
	else if (specBar == 6)
	{

		fsBar(500, 0, 12326);
		fsBar(500, 0, 12327);
		fsBar(500, 0, 12328);
		fsBar(500, 0, 12329);
		fsBar(500, 0, 12330);
		fsBar(0, 0, 12331);
		fsBar(0, 0, 12332);
		fsBar(0, 0, 12333);
		fsBar(0, 0, 12334);
	}

		fsBar(0, 0, 12328);

		fsBar(0, 0, 12333);
		fsBar(0, 0, 12334);
	}

}

case 48023:
if(!specOn)
{
sendQuest("@yel@S P E C I A L A T T A C K", 12335);
specOn = true;
} else {
sendQuest(“S P E C I A L A T T A C K”, 12335);
specOn = false;
}
break;
[/code]

And this for the whip (not that im sure if it helps)

} else if (WeaponName.endsWith("whip")) { setSidebarInterface(0, 12290); //flick, lash, deflect sendFrame246(12291, 200, Weapon); sendFrame126(WeaponName, 12293);

But anyway, The whip is the only weapon with a special attack bar, I have no idea why or how it is added to it, i’ve searched so much, I want to be able to add it to different weapons ect, If anyone can see in the code or knows of where this is (and which file) could you please tell me,

Im using gangscape v5.

thankyou
